pinyin: yi1 ren2 de2 dao4 , ji1 quan3 sheng1 tian1

definitions.yi1 ren2 de2 dao4 , ji1 quan3 sheng1 tia: lit. when a man achieves the Dao, his poultry and dogs rise to Heaven (idiom); fig. to ride on sb else's success; Once one man gets a government position, all his cronies get in too; Once sb has cracked the problem, every Tom, Dick and Harry can do it;
